comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Why don't you check out exchanger monitors like BestChange? --> https://www.bestchange.com/sepa-to-bitcoin.htmlThe rates many not seem a little friendly but well, that's the cost of using exchangersYou could also alternatively check out p2p or c2c crypto exchanges for buyers and sellers that accept SEPA as a payment method.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on October 28, 2022, 07:46:06 PMWhy don't you check out exchanger monitors like BestChange? --> https://www.bestchange.com/sepa-to-bitcoin.htmlThe rates many not seem a little friendly but well, that's the cost of using exchangersMost of the exchanges from BestExchange are very strict and some of them require KYC I heard a few people having an issue with some of the exchange listed on BestExchange.@OP if you want to deal with someone the best place to post this is currency exchange . Sample this one who is looking for a long-term business with sepa below - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5413046.0It fits your needs I guess but the rate is pretty high.If you are looking for more like the above said P2P is your other options check bisq it doesn't require KYC.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: GlobalExchange on October 28, 2022, 12:05:29 PMAt this point we are looking for a crypto exchanger / crpyot exchanging service that will exchange SEPA transfers to cryptocurrencies for us. We only work with larger sums and are interested in long-term contacts.If you mean by us, a business that receives and sends thousands of dollars per day, I do not think that most platforms will meet your conditions, there are markets called OTC market and accept these requests at prices ranging from 50 thousand dollars per day to several million dollars.But if your activity is less than this, I do not advise you to register yourself as a commercial company due to the many legal complications.
